title: ExoGP
description: FLY, FIGHT, SURVIVE. A high-stakes racing experience set in a hostile universe, ExoGP merges the thrill of flight-based racing with the strategic depth of combat and customization. Race and battle ruthless competition to make a name for yourself as a legend of the skies.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **Play ExoGP**
<!--text-->
ExoGP is a competitive combat racing game featuring dynamic flight-based action, deep customization, and immersive spectating.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **Keep up off-worlder, Planet Atmos is dangerous and you don’t want to be last**
<!--text-->
ExoGP, set on the distant mining colony Atmos, is a futuristic and competitive combat racing game. Equipped with customizable Exos, players take to the skies with six degrees of freedom, offering them nuanced and responsive control. Pit yourself against other players with thrusters firing, guns blazing, and skills being tested at every moment.

<!--image-->
![ExoGP-odj9k](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/986d6cd774a048388c37f43f654098cf/exogp-odj9k.jpg)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **Defy Gravity**
<!--text-->
The Exo offers players a large variety of movement options and mechanics that blend together dynamically. Turn and fly in any direction you choose while mixing together turns, rolls, jukes, and more to keep ahead of your opponents as you battle your way to victory.

<!--image-->
![ExoGP-1v2xi](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/986d6cd774a048388c37f43f654098cf/exogp-1v2xi.jpg)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **Everything but the Kitchen Sink**
<!--text-->
Deploy an arsenal of modules, weapons and tools that you can use to keep ahead of your opponents or send them spiraling out of the skies. Shoot a hail of hot lead, drop explosive mines, and supercharge your thrusters as you take every advantage you can get. After all, only one person can win. Take no prisoners.

<!--image-->
![ExoGP-1kbxo](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/986d6cd774a048388c37f43f654098cf/exogp-1kbxo.jpg)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **Your Exo, Your Style**
<!--text-->
The Exo is a customizable flight suit, a feat of engineering sure, but no sport would be complete without adding a little personality to your uniform. Change its colors, cover it head-to-toe in decals, or make it glisten like it just came off the assembly line; The choice is yours. The Exo is an extension of the pilot, a second skin that you can fine-tune to fit your playstyle. Build an unstoppable tank, a track blazing speed demon, an acrobatic flier, or anything else you can think up to dominate the track.

<!--image-->
![ExoGP-y3gj8](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/986d6cd774a048388c37f43f654098cf/exogp-y3gj8.jpg)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **Unlimited Ways to Win**
<!--text-->
From casual quickplay to highly competitive ranked game modes, find the game mode that suits you. If you want to make it personal, you can challenge your friends in a private lobby with custom rules. Maybe spend some time taking on single player challenges while you hone your skills for multiplayer races.

<!--image-->
![ExoGP-13rvc](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/986d6cd774a048388c37f43f654098cf/exogp-13rvc.jpg)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **A Dangerous and Remote World**
<!--text-->
Planet Atmos is an untamed world discovered and settled by spacefaring miners in 2544. Sent to harvest rare ores and minerals, they were promised wealth and a fresh start - for themselves and mankind. In their alien and hostile new home, these settlers came to rely on advanced exoskeleton technology to survive, honing their new tool into a sophisticated full-body flight suit. It didn’t take long for the people of Planet Atmos to find ways to use the Exo suits for sport when they weren’t busy mining and failing to terraform the planet.

<!--image-->
![ExoGP-55xm6](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/986d6cd774a048388c37f43f654098cf/exogp-55xm6.jpg)
